sql: CREATE TABLE floor(id VARCHAR(255) PRIMARY KEY,name VARCHAR(255),building VARCHAR(255),floor_number INTEGER);
name: create table floor

sql: CREATE TABLE asset(id VARCHAR(255) PRIMARY KEY,name VARCHAR(255),site VARCHAR(255),category VARCHAR(255),mac_address VARCHAR(255));
name: create table asset

sql: CREATE TABLE building(id VARCHAR(255) PRIMARY KEY,name VARCHAR(255),site VARCHAR(255));
name: create table building
recover answer

sql: CREATE TABLE position(mac_address VARCHAR(255) PRIMARY KEY,floor_id VARCHAR(255),latitude VARCHAR(255),longitude VARCHAR(255));
name: create table position
manage answer
preparation for getting asset locations
position insertion preparation

rules.to: Sorry, no item of this category is available.

name: redirection when no position available

sql: SELECT a.name AS asset,f.id AS floor_id,f.name AS floor_name,f.floor_number AS floor_number,b.id AS building_id,b.name AS building_name,p.latitude AS latitude,p.longitude AS longitude FROM position AS p JOIN asset AS a ON p.mac_address=a.mac_address JOIN floor AS f ON f.id=p.floor_id JOIN building AS b ON b.id=f.building;
name: recover assets
Description of object
when no position
info: When no position is available msg.topic is an empty string therefore the sql node does not return any message so filtering the low part of the flow is automatic

name: First we reset the datatables
info:
By doing that, we know our tables are updated.
The original idea was to update tables every once in a while, but it caused authentification issues so for the moment we update them every time the chatbot is used.

name: Connection to networkale
info: We need to recover a token to be able to retrieve all the information we need from networkale.
